meanings.sent1: The luteinizations in the body help regulate hormone levels.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the luteinizations to understand fertility better.
meanings.sent3: The luteinizations decided to throw a party in the ovaries.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work was like the luteinizations, always on time and efficient.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained luteinizations as the key players in the menstrual cycle.
